D

DEFAULT_MAX_PRIME_RUN_VALIDATION_ATTEMPTS - Static variable in class nerot.task.BaseTask
The default number of maximum prime run validation attempts, which is 5.
DEFAULT_PRIME_RUN_ON_START - Static variable in class nerot.task.BaseTask
The default prime run on start value, which is true.
DEFAULT_PRIME_RUN_VALIDATION_ATTEMPT_INTERVAL_MILLIS - Static variable in class nerot.task.BaseTask
The default interval in milliseconds between prime run validation attempts, which is 1000 (1 sec).

N

nerot - package nerot
 
Nerot - Class in nerot
Nerot lets you to easily schedule tasks on the fly (using Quartz and Spring), calling any object instance's method with any arguments you specify (class method or instance method) and can cache the result for access in a separate thread with built-in RSS retrieval and caching (using Rome).
Nerot() - Constructor for class nerot.Nerot
 
nerot.spring - package nerot.spring
 
nerot.store - package nerot.store
 
nerot.task - package nerot.task
 

P

Primable - Interface in nerot.task
Tasks implementing the ability to run once at beginning of schedule and perhaps checking a few times to attempt for it to start correctly.
primeRun() - Method in class nerot.task.BaseTask
Call execute() asynchronously via TaskRunner in a new Thread.
primeRun() - Method in interface nerot.task.Primable
Executes the task once prior to scheduling, if isPrimeRunOnStart().

U

unschedule(String) - Method in class nerot.Nerot
This unschedules a task, by calling deleteJob on the Quartz scheduler.
unscheduleAll() - Method in class nerot.Nerot
This unschedules all tasks, using the unschedule method.
